Vikazimut is a project of students from the National Engineering School ENSICAEN which aims to facilitate the practice of orienteering sports.
The application replaces the map, the compass and the control card and displays a retrospective analysis of the route taken.

The orienteer uses the application to find the way using the map and validates the passage at the checkpoints manually with the Qr code or automatically with the GPS position. At the end of the course, the application displays some statistics: the total time, the split times and the course trace on the map.

Vikazimut comes in two modes. A race mode where the orienteer is not helped for the position and a walk mode where the orienteer is positioned on the map in real time. In walk mode, some routes display cultural information at the checkpoints

Wed altijd en overal op je mobiel dankzij de nieuwe mobiele applicatie (app) van Scooore. 

Garandeer je van de hoogste noteringen en een ruim aanbod sportweddenschappen op meer dan 50 verschillende sporten:

- Voetbal
- Tennis
- Basketbal
- Hockey
- Darts
- Volleybal
- Formule 1
- Wielrennen
- Cricket
- … +50 andere

Hoogste Notering

Als trotse partner van de Rode Duivels en de Red Flames bieden we de hoogste noteringen aan op alle voetbalwedstrijden van België. 

Scooore biedt ook de hoogste noteringen aan op de belangrijkste competities en toernooien in voetbal zoals de wereldbeker 2022 (WK 2022), Nations League, Pro League, Premier League, Serie A, La Liga, Champions League, Europa League, Conference League en andere internationale belangrijke voetbalcompetities. Ook op de belangrijkste competities en toernooien van andere sporten zoals de Grand Slams, Formule 1, NHL, NBA, Olympische Spelen en vele andere grote sportevenementen. 

Odd & Profit Boost

Scooore biedt niet alleen de beste noteringen aan, maar pakt ook uit met ‘Odd Boosts’ en ‘Profit Boosts’ op verschillende sporten. Dagelijks ontvang je nieuwe verhoogde noteringen (Odd Boosts) en/of winstverhogingen (Profit Boosts) op meerdere sporten. Hiermee verzeker je je van de hoogste notering en verhoog je je winst.

Combi Boost

Dankzij de “Combi Boost” kan jouw combinatieweddenschap tot wel 50% verhoogd worden! Hoe meer selecties je opneemt in jouw combinatieweddenschap, hoe groter jouw winst wordt geboost.

Cash Out

Dankzij de ‘Cash Out’ vermijd je het nemen van risico en houd je controle over je weddenschap. Ben je minder zeker geworden van jouw weddenschap door onverwachte wedstrijdomstandigheden, of wil je het zekere voor het onzekere nemen door je winst al te laten uitbetalen? De “Cash Out” maakt dit mogelijk! Voortaan kan je zelf bepalen om jouw weddenschap al dan niet vroegtijdig te laten afhandelen.


Verantwoord Spelen 

Sportweddenschappen zijn in de eerste plaats plezant. En bij Scooore willen we dat zo houden. We gaan meteen een stap verder dan de anderen en engageren ons om jou en al onze spelers te beschermen. We helpen je dan ook graag om de controle te bewaren door alleen te wedden met de financiële middelen die je hebt. Kenners geven je goede raad om jezelf te beschermen en tegelijk volop plezier te beleven. Toch problemen? Dan wijzen we je de weg naar professionele en vooral menselijke hulp. Ontdek onze tips en tools die maken dat spelen leuk blijft:
- Bepaal je spelersprofiel
- Bepaal je speellimieten en behoud de controle
- Verantwoord wedden met onze tips

Het is noodzakelijk om meerderjarig (18+) zijn om een spelersrekening op Scooore aan te maken en de app te gebruiken.  

Wie jonger is dan 18 mag niet deelnemen aan sportweddenschappen. Dat is de wet. Vooral omdat geldspelen bij een minderjarige een verslavingsrisico inhouden, met negatieve gevolgen voor de hersenontwikkeling en het welzijn.

Toelating voor Scooore NV om (sport)weddenschappen in te richten: de Kansspelcommissie reikte op 18.5.2022 de vergunningen F1 en F1+ uit, voor haar aanbod tot 18 mei 2031 via de vaste en mobiele inrichtingen en de informatiemaatschappij-instrumenten.

© 2022 Scooore NV, filiaal van de Nationale Loterij

The APP of Dolomiti Superski is supposed to be a real online ski guide for those who want to discover the world’s largest ski carousel and is supported by all the operating systems of the most common smart phones. It has new graphics and a modern navigation: horizontal movements (swipe) allow users to switch from one of the 12 ski areas of Dolomiti Superski to the next in numerical order, while vertical movements (scroll) lead to various menu options, functions and services within the chosen ski area. If the GPS function of the device is activated, when the APP is launched, the system will lead to a contents page for the Dolomiti Superski ski area in which the user is located. One can login through the "MyDolomiti" community, after having registered (free of charge) to use the services. The APP offers useful information such as the open/closed status of individual lifts and slopes in real time, opening hours of the lifts, breaks, weather forecasts, points of interest such as ski schools, ski rentals, infopoints, Pick-up Box, as well as descriptions and contacts. 
The user will also find other interesting and popular functions, such as the Performance Check, Tracking option to record the route taken while skiing, Routing which will navigate you to a predetermined point on the slopes. By reaching certain goals with the "Tracking" function, the user will be assigned interesting Badges - a great way to challenge yourself! And finally, you get to play too since the registered members of the APP-community can also have fun with the APP's game functions, creating their network of friends, who must also be registered members and in possession of a Dolomiti Superski ski pass and challenging each other throughout the ski season.
Discover the new APP’s full potential watching the video tutorials.

Athlete Focus - Myplay is a powerful training tool for athletes who are constantly striving to improve their game. Video training enables the athlete to analyze their on-court decision making, and also gain significant insight and perspective on their game.

Club Managing Tool - As an athletic director, it is important to have control of your teams. Myplay enables athletic directors quick video access to each court at any given moment. Athletic directors can track an athletes progress, see coaches feedback and stream practice sessions and live games!

Enhance Engagement - Myplay platform is an off-court meeting place for your team. With Myplay, your team can revisit games and share all the highlights with their families and friends, creating a highly engaged and supportive community.

Scoring darts has never been easier. Dart Scorer Cricket and X01 allows you to keep track of your cricket, X01, Around The Clock and Shanghai game scores. Play with 2, 3 and 4 players or play on your own against our Score Bot AI to perfect your dart throwing skills. 

Use AirPlay and Apple TV to project a completely custom score board (unique from your iPhone screen) for all players to follow along with the game score and stats.

Matches are saved so you can start as many different dart games as you like and come back to them later. 

Cricket:
* Up to 4 players in standard cricket, cut-throat and no points modes.
* Play single player Cricket against Score Bot, our dart throwing AI, with easy, medium and hard difficulty levels.
* Stats for marks per round saved for each match and every player.

X01:
* Up to 4 players in X01 with 101, 301, 501, 701, 901 and 1001 modes.
* Play single player X01 against Score Bot, our dart throwing AI, with easy, medium and hard difficulty levels.
* X01 options include straight in, double in or triple in for first throw. 
* X01 options include straight out, double out or triple out for close out.
* X01 scoring suggestions appear directly on the dart board. The recommended target will appear bright green.

Around The Clock:
* Up to 4 players in Around The Clock 
* Custom option to end on 20 or on bullseye

Shanghai:
* Up to 4 players in Shanghai
* Play 7, 10, 15 or 20 round Shanghai.

Game Features:
* Save matches and game history with support for multiple games in progress. 
* Intuitive scoring system with 3D touch support for clean and simple UI.
* Detailed match history allows you to transfer games to league scoresheets.
* Track misses and any non-scoring dart throws.
* Track player progress with win %, matches played, marks per round (cricket), points per dart (x01) and 3 dart average (x01) history for all games played.
* Eliminates math error with score totals.
* Leading player name turns gold to easily see who is winning.
* X01 Score Assistant helps you decide where to aim. 
* Get further assistance using our 3-Dart and 2-Dart checkout tables.
* Undo button allows you to fix any mistakes.
* Score dart throws with your voice. Simply tap and hold the microphone button and speak your scores and we will enter them automatically.
* In-game commentary nudges players when it's their turn to throw and awards you with positive feedback when you do well.
* Add/edit players and track player progress.
* Upload player avatars.
* Completed match screen shows player rank and number of darts thrown by winning player.
* View in-game stats including Marks Per Round for cricket games and Points per dart & 3 Dart Avg for X01 games.
* View player stats including Marks Per Round for cricket and Points Per Dart for X01. Player stats can be filtered based on opponent.
* View Dart game match results that include Marks Per Round for cricket games and Points Per Dart for X01 games.
* Customize your experience with game options, custom sound effects and themes.
* iPad Pro and iPhone X support.

How to score:
* Single, double or triple tap a dart button to score a single, double or triple respectively, or long press a dart button to score.
* Tap the miss button to record a miss.
* Tap the next (forward arrow) button to move to the next players turn.
* Tap the undo (back arrow) button to undo the last throw.
* Tap the reset button to restart the current game.
* Or, you can tap and hold the microphone button to speak your score. For example, you can say things like "Double 19, Triple 16, Miss", then release the microphone button to apply the score.

Additional Info and Feedback:
* View Rules of each game from within the app by going to Settings > Game Rules

The Openrunner app is your partner for all your outdoor activities. Acting as a real GPS it enables you to locate and visualise your position as well as your progress on topographic maps. It also provides information of the number of kilometres, altitude, cumulated height difference, etc. To ensure your friends and family can keep track of your movements the app features a function that informs a selection of your contacts of your position in real-time. 

The app enables you to access all the routes recorded on the OpenRunner website and also all of the public routes available (> 4,000,000).

The app has a feature that lets you download topographic maps to ensure that these can be displayed out in the field, even in zones that are not covered by a 3G/4G network. An off-line mode is also available to limit network access to a strict minimum and preserve your phone battery as much as possible when using the app.

You need to create a free account and to log on to the site. Access to topographic maps requires an annual or monthly subscription.

List of functionalities:
 - Find all your programmed routes on the OpenRunner website and let yourself be guided by app to follow them in the field.
- Search for routes close to your position or within the zone of your choice.
- Download topologic map to use off-line. This will ensure you are able to display the map background regardless of 3G/4G coverage and will preserve your phone battery by using your smartphone as a real outdoor GPS.
- Live Tracking: Keep your friends and family informed in real time of your position and movements at all times during your outdoor activity.
- Record all your outdoor activities and transfer them to the OpenRunner website to share them or make changes to them.
- Take pictures while you record your activity so as to associate them with your route.
- Add community POI to inform users of roadworks and useful information (ex: gravel on the road, road closed).

Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.

Unieke gids als cursist, VTS-medewerker (DSKO, docent, cursusverantwoordelijke, …) of gekwalificeerde van de Vlaamse Trainersschool.

De app van de Vlaamse Trainersschool (VTS) is een initiatief van het agentschap Sport Vlaanderen, in samenwerking met de erkende Vlaamse sportfederaties en de universiteiten en hogescholen LO.

Alle informatie over de sportkaderopleidingen en bijscholingen van de Vlaamse Trainersschool en haar partners is terug te vinden via deze app.

Via deze toepassing heb je ook alle functionaliteit als Mijn VTS-gebruiker ter beschikking, dat betekent … alle informatie van de Vlaamse Trainersschool volledig op maat van jezelf.


* Wil je een Mijn VTS-gebruiker aanmaken, je persoonsgegevens of wachtwoord wijzigen? Als je al een VTS-gebruiker hebt aangemaakt via onze website, gebruik je dezelfde.
* Heb je ooit bij de Vlaamse Trainersschool een kwalificatie behaald, dan vind je die terug en kan je een gratis digitaal duplicaat downloden of delen?
* Wil je actuele informatie over cursusorganisaties (incl. actuele lessenroosters met automatische meldingen en inschrijfmogelijkheid), bijscholingen of toelatingsproeven ?
* Wil je de actuele informatie over de info in je VTS-digiloket opvolgen of wil je nieuwe bewijsstukken opladen ?
* Wil je kwaliteitsbevragingen beantwoorden?
* Wil je als cursist of docent alle lessen, examens of herexamens importeren in je eigen agenda ?
* Wil je als docent op de hoogte blijven van je docentenrooster en alle wijzigingen hierin ontvangen of wil je scores voor cursisten ingeven ?
* Wil je als denkcellid van de Vlaamse Trainersschool de documenten van vergaderingen raadplegen?
* Wil je de aanwezigheid van deelnemers aan een bijscholing registreren via een scansysteem?
* Op al die vragen – en nog veel meer – geeft de app van de Vlaamse Trainersschool je snel het antwoord.
 

Functionaliteit:

* Aanmaken Mijn VTS-gebruiker
* Beheren van je persoonsgegevens (incl. wachtwoord)
* Voorkeuren instellen op het startscherm voor de opleidingen of bijscholingen die je interesse wegdragen zo krijg je onmiddellijk aangeboden wat je voorkeur wegdraagt waarbij je meerdere filters kan combineren
* Opzoeken en downloaden van al je kwalificaties die je behaalde bij de Vlaamse Trainersschool
* Zoeken in het opleidings- en bijscholingsaanbod van de Vlaamse Trainersschool en hiervoor inschrijven
* Alle les-, examen- en herexamenmomenten importeren in je agenda op je smartphone (cursisten en docenten)
* Opvolgen van al je informatie over je cursusorganisaties bij de Vlaamse Trainersschool (lessenrooster, scores, routenavigatie naar de lesplaatsen, ...)
* Documenten opladen om vrijstellingen of kortingen aan te vragen via je VTS-digiloket
* Je facturen raadplegen en een digitaal duplicaat downloaden
* Meldingen ontvangen op je startscherm. Deze meldingen betreffen:
    
    * Wijzigingen in je lessenrooster (cursist) of docentenrooster (docent/lesgever)
    * Kwaliteitsbevragingen die klaar staan voor jou
    * Berichtencentrum
        * Inbox
        * Archief
        * Verwijdermogelijkheid
        * Antwoordmogelijkheid

* Opvolgen van je bijscholingen en toelatingsproeven
* Opvolgen van de deelnemerslijst en lessenrooster (cursusverantwoordelijke)
* Opvolgen van je docentenrooster (docent/lesgever)
* Ingeven van aanwezigheden of scores voor cursisten of deelnemers aan bijscholingen (docent/lesgever)
* Raadplegen van denkcelvergaderingen en documenten die aan deze vergaderingen vasthangen (denkcellid)
*Stel via de app ook je vraag aan de juiste contactpersoon bij de Vlaamse Trainersschool

The only darts scoring app officially endorsed by global darts brand Unicorn.

Russ Bray referees at all major Professional Darts Corporation (PDC) tournaments including the World Championship final. He is widely considered to be the best darts referee in the world.

In the app Russ referees your darts match in full including speaking your name, throws, total left, and shot-outs with his silky vocal tones exactly as he does on TV.

Game, shot and the match to Russ Bray Darts Scorer Pro!

VERSUS (2 PLAYER):
You and a friend battle it out on the oche.

ONLINE (2 PLAYER):
Play remotely against friends without leaving your own homes (cross platform support).

PRACTICE ROOM (IMPROVE):
Improve your game by playing Bob's 27, Around The Clock, Scoring 99 and more.  Choose to play solo or against the computer.
Play X01 and Cricket against the computer.

TOURNAMENT (CHAMPIONSHIP):
Recreate the atmosphere of the big stage by playing Tournaments in your own home. Include human and virtual computer players, play knockout or league format with double in, random draw, sets or legs, seeded players and so much more.

TOUR (CAREER MODE):
Play a career mode with a full schedule of Tournaments. Earn money and see if you can finish top of the end of season rankings.

MULTI (3+ PLAYERS):
Unlimited number of players can contest a match, from three to thirty, the choice is yours.

PERFORMANCE CENTRE:
Numerous charts to track your progress over time

HEADLINE FEATURES:
- TV style presentation with gameplay on the Unicorn Eclipse Ultra dartboard.
- World professional referee Russ Bray calling all the shots just like as he does on TV.
- Personalised audio, hear Russ speak YOUR name (over 4000 names including nicknames). If your name is not available you can request Russ to record it for you personally.
- Voice Scoring. For fully fluid gameplay no need to mess about with keypads. Just speak your throws, retrieve your darts and Russ will call your match in full.
- Set your own custom start number between 101 and 9999.
- Cricket scoring.
- Save matches and resume them at any time.
- Match history and detailed stats for the current match and all past matches including average, first 9 average, best leg (darts thrown), highest checkout, highest throw, doubles hit, legs against throw and score counts (60's, 100's, 140's and 180's counts). 
- Individual throws are all recorded.
- Head to Head match stats.
- Score the total for the each throw or dart separately.
- Option to automatically switch entry mode to single dart when on a finish.
- ProScore option for manually tracking of missed doubles (MD), and darts thrown when finishing or busting a score.
- Option to have an open ended game (set winning target to 0).
- Play with leg or set scoring (3 or 5 leg sets).
- Averages and checkouts can be displayed when a finish is available.
- Bull up to decide starting player.
- Tie breaks to win by two clear legs.
- Play the computer at twenty skill levels.
- Play with handicaps.
- Real to life TrueThrow mechanics with the computer throwing intelligently depending on the match situation.
- Create your own computer players at any level (mimic the pro's).
- Play a computer version of yourself, your friends or any of the other human players.
- Undo any score including after the leg or match has finished.

Note: We want you to enjoy the app and get the most from it. If you have any issues or comments use the support link from within the app and we will contact you as soon as possible.
